question: You say that the asthma inhaler invalidates the fast but I heard it doesn't.It is not ingested like a normal medication but inhaled.Will this make any difference regarding whether it breaks the fast.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The inhaling of the asthma pump invalidates the fast. There is no difference
between the ingestion and inhaling of medication.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
